name: PSY-Frame Accelerator
text: Once per turn: You can pay 500 LP, then target 1 "PSY-Frame" monster you control; banish it until your next Standby Phase. Once per turn, if another face-up "PSY-Frame" card you control leaves the field (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 "PSY-Frame" monster from your hand.
